Latest News

Umm Salal crowned champions of 2023-2024
season Ooredoo Cup

Umm Salal defeated Al Arabi 3-1 in penalty shoot-out to be crowned the 2023-
2024 season Ooredoo Cup champions at the Grand Hamad Stadium of Al Arabi
club on Saturday after the regular time of the final ended in a 4-4 draw. Mr. Hani‚Ä¶
